longdesc.p: Routemap is a jquery mobile plugin to render a route data.

Routemap supports JSON format for DB. So, user can set DB by setting a file path or a variable on the widget.And it drawing the line between two stations automatically to use DB. You can change each style for stations, routes, and labels to modify DB.
Routemap can indecated the shortest route between two stations that user selected. And it supports a multi-language, also.

desc.p: The URL of a JSON file or a javascript variable to load.
Determine the current languauge. The valuse must be the abbreviation of language names(ex: English > en )
The length unit of the route map. If the value is 10 and a station coordinate is (1, 2) then the station will be displayed at (10, 20).

event.name: create
event.desc: Triggered when a routemap is created

method.name: getCodeByName
method.desc: Gets an array of station code associated with the specified station name.

method.name: getNameByCode
method.desc: Gets a station name with associated the specified station code.

method.name: shortestRoute
method.desc: Returns the array of station codes which is the shortest route from source to destination.

method.name: minimumTransfers
method.desc: Returns the array of station codes which is the route having minimum transfers from source to destination.

method.name: highlight
method.desc: Adds a highlighting style to stations.

method.name: dishighlight
method.desc: Removes a highlighting style from stations.

method.name: refresh
method.desc: Resizes&redraws the widget, after having made some external modifications.

argument.name: redraw
argument.desc:
When set to true, the widget will redraw everything by a route data.
Only re-layout the widget if set to false.
